Package brickdestroyer.model.entities

package brickdestroyer.model.entities
  • Class
    Description
    Ball
    Abstract Ball class is the superclass of all concrete ball class in the game.
    BallFactory
    Ball Factory uses the factory design pattern to generate different types of ball in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    BlackStoneBrick
    Black Stone Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    Brick
    Abstract Brick class is the superclass of all concrete brick class in the game.
    Brick.ImpactDirection
     
    BrickFactory
    Brick Factory uses the factory design pattern to generate different types of brick in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    CementBrick
    Cement Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    ClayBrick
    Clay Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    Crack
    Crack class contains the properties and behavior of a crackable brick class such as cement brick in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    Entity
    This interface is used to ensure all entities will have the behavior to retrieve the basic properties of each entity's class in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    HasteBrick
    Haste Brick class is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    Movable
    This interface is to ensure all movable entities will have the behavior of moving in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    Player
    Player is a concrete class used to represent the entities control by the player in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    RubberBall
    Rubber ball is a concrete class used to represent an object for the user to clear different types of brick in the game of Brick Destroyer.
    SteelBrick
    Steel Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
